titles.title: A bill to designate the building which will house the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Texas in Lufkin, Texas as the "Ward R. Burke United States Courthouse".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 9/16/1988--Introduced. Designates the building which will house the U.S. District Court for the Eastern District of Texas at Third Street and Lufkin Avenue in Lufkin, Texas, as the Ward R. Burke United States Courthouse.
